about_the_game:
Play as physically and mentally exhausted junior student Rin, and experience the gradual process of a middle schooler being driven insane by her family, suffering from bipolar disorder. You can choose to believe your parents over and over again, or you can choose to be wary of them from the start.When reality and illusion begin to intertwine, can you really guarantee that you won't be trapped in a dream?

The player needs to keep clicking to continue the story and choose at certain points to experience different plots.

Different options lead to different plots, but the ending is doomed because it's a memory, not the future.

“I guessed I really didn't deserve it. Because I didn't do my part. I didn't deserve my parents, my teachers, my classmates, my friends. I didn't deserve anything in this world. It was not surprising. I was born with nothing anyway.”

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains language voilence, self-mutilation, mental abuse, which might cause discomfort.

detailed_description:
Play as physically and mentally exhausted junior student Rin, and experience the gradual process of a middle schooler being driven insane by her family, suffering from bipolar disorder. You can choose to believe your parents over and over again, or you can choose to be wary of them from the start.When reality and illusion begin to intertwine, can you really guarantee that you won't be trapped in a dream?

The player needs to keep clicking to continue the story and choose at certain points to experience different plots.

Different options lead to different plots, but the ending is doomed because it's a memory, not the future.

“I guessed I really didn't deserve it. Because I didn't do my part. I didn't deserve my parents, my teachers, my classmates, my friends. I didn't deserve anything in this world. It was not surprising. I was born with nothing anyway.”

short_description: East-Asia-theme horror visual novel with tarot elements. This game shares the same world with When the Wind Knocks (Ready to Kill) and The Dead Daughter. If you have played that game, you will meet an old friend here.
